Title: Private Data Disclosure
Description: A malicious user could go to your application and send a request for `GET /User?distinct=password` and get all the passwords for all the users in the database, despite the field being set to private. This could also be used for other private data if the malicious user knew what was set as private for specific routes.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.0.0a up to 3.0.1, all versions up to 2.4.2
Solution: Update to at least version 3.1.0 or 2.5.0
